title: Find a process listening to any tcp port
info: For example to find the process using the port 3000: `lsoft -i tcp:3000`

title: Download a directory from a remote server
info:
This command downloads a directory with all its content to a local directory using rsync.
Only files not existing in local will be downloaded

title: Make a file executable
info: This command change the file permissions allowing to be executed

title: Add node and php binaries of the current directoy
info: You can add this line to your source file, for example `~/.zshrc`
